directions: [["Smash ramen into pieces (while in package), add ramen with seasoning and remaining browning ingredients in frying pan. Brown slightly while stirring. Cool on paper towel and set aside."],["Mix all dressing ingredients in separate 'shaker' container and shake well before using. "],["Mix all 3 parts of the recipe together one hour prior to serving. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
